storyInfo: Team Rainbow, Rhodes Island and the community artists commence their joint operation to thwart the imaginary-turned-real terrorist attack at the Galería.

attributes.content: Sir, all ceremony attendees are under our control now, and Reynell has been secured on his balcony.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Good. Are our reinforcements in position?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Fifteen trucks are parked outside the gallery perimeter.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: You don't need me to tell you what to do next.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Sir!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Remember, tell those huasos not to wreck the art as they load it on the trucks.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: If anyone damages a single piece, I'll take a finger off them.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Roger.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Oh, also, don't forget to confiscate the terminals off those pampered shits.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: And any belongings they have on them, I'm assuming we also...
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Hmph. You get it, I like that.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: I don't care how you handle the people, but the art, you use a feather touch on that.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Go. I still need to see Señor Reynell about something.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Good morning. Nice view of the sunrise?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Sorry, you're far too cultured for that. I should be asking you if it's 'beautiful,' no?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: The silent treatment? If you think you're any safer for it, you're gravely mistaken.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: But let's get on topic, which is that I have no topic for you. All you need to do is sit here, behave, and act like you're a victim of a terror attack.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: —That's what you're casting me as?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Oh, look at that. You do have a mouth.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Sorry, my fault. I thought you'd seen through something or other, but then I thought a little more, and no, this is just the coincidental idiotic concoction of a man blinded by greed.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: How about that? Upstanding airs a moment ago, and now you're starting to lose your temper.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: No, I have no complaints at all regarding this coincidence. Because I've come to see it for what it is, simply the finishing touch on my final creation—
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: And of course, because it was coincidence and not your intention, I thank Lady Luck before you, Captain.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Excellent. Now shut up.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Sir, Sir!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: What? Intruders?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: No, actually, it's...
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: We'd better talk inside.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Papá, did we get the date wrong or what?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Impossible. Look at the scene—a crowd was here just moments ago. Something happened.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: So someone saw us, reported to Reynell, and he ran back inside the gallery?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: This isn't Reynell's MO. Supposing he did know we were coming, he might be outraged, or excited, but he'd never turn tail and run.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: So what is this...?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Huh? A terminal? Is that mine?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Hello? Ernesto?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Speaking.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: How's it going? Getting somewhere with your personal business?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Arleta, notify the street art people not to go near the Galería, at least for today.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: What? Why?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: They've planted a huge amount of Originium explosives in there, ready to blow at any time.
attributes.name: Tequila
Catapult
attributes.content: Originium what?

attributes.name: Catapult
attributes.content: Eheh... ahaha...
Arleta, I don't like the sound of that laugh. Where are you?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Me, Ela's gang, Tecno, Diaz, the artists... everyone's in the plaza in front of the gallery right now.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: So why don't you get out of there, fast?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Sorry, bro, but I've got a few questions for you too.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Ernesto, why are you this clued in? Where are you?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Cool, got it. Tell me every last piece of information you have, Ernesto.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Arleta!
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Or else I'm going in to save you like I don't know a damned thing.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Pelotudo!
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: I tell you to make sure your men don't wreck the artwork, and you proceed to ruin one personally!
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Sir, just hear me out! Inside that pitcher I broke, there was a... a...
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: ...An Originium bomb.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: A what?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: And it's—it's not even the only one!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: I spotted a suspicious wall in the stairwell, like it was freshly plastered over, which didn't seem right...
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: So you broke the wall down? And there were bombs there too?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Not bombs, they were... detonation controller nodes... which means there's more than one detonator, and there could be more explosives than we know.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: —That's what you're casting me as?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I thought you'd seen through something or other, but then I thought a little more, and no, this is just the coincidental idiotic concoction of a man blinded by greed.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: (Deep breath)
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Sir, these things could level the whole gallery! And we don't even know how they detonate! It could be manual or timed!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Let's load everything as fast as we can, take the cash of the rich guys, and call it here!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: You're ready to just walk away?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: The bombs are inside the Galería! Ready or not isn't the question here, sir!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: If we don't pull this off, we'll be public enemies of the Coalition government and Dossoles!
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: All we have to do is run! They won't catch us!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Run where? Into the wilds? Hand a couple hundred gold certificates to each man and disband? What have we been risking our lives for?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: No—Sir, I'm serious, if worst comes to worst we can ditch the country as mercenaries—or bandits!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Bandits?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: I... I'm just supposing, my point is we don't have to play along with Reynell's insanity.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Fine, I get it. Who else knows of this?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Only me—I haven't dared tell anyone else. I was worried the news would panic the men, so I came straight to you.
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Very well done.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Go. Tell them they can stop hauling. Clean the cuicos downstairs of every last drop of their grease, then we evac immediately.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Thank you!
attributes.name: Commanding Officer

attributes.content: Oh, also, stop losing your head. Speak calm, walk slow, and don't let them see a single crack. You hear me?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: The soldier about-faces, then breaks into a run for the stairs. Suddenly comes the sound of a bowstring.
He has no time to look back before a heavy bolt pieces straight through his back and protrudes from his chest.
My boy, after so much loyalty, so much preparation, so many decisions, so many points of no return... you go off to be a bandit?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: I lost my chance to turn back.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: So did you.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: A terrorist attack 'collage?'
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Reynell set up the bombs, the Captain took the crowd hostage, and neither seemed to know what the other was up to. That's what Ernesto tells me, anyway.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: ...They're both insane.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Yeah, both of them are crazy. We need to prep for the worst-case scenario, with the hostages prioritized above all else on all counts.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Let's hash out a concrete plan of action. We've got five names to our side. Iana, Doc, Fuze, me, and Rhodes Island's Catapult...
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Count me in too.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: You sure?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Don't forget my past life.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Besides, it's not just that Reynell bastard trapped in there, and not just the investors either—many are ordinary folk. I have to go.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Papá...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Don't try talking me out of it, I'm going.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Who's talking out? I'm going too!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: You?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: You and the others can forget it. It's dangerous in there—
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Come on, Papá, think about it. Sure we've never been firefighters, but otherwise, we're thinking everything you're thinking, no?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Guys, listen to me! We're about to rescue everyone in the Galería!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: This is entirely voluntary! Everyone who's in, step forward and listen to Ela!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: If you don't want to go, no pressure! Head back to the neighborhood, in case Mateo makes a move on our community and screws us before he's down for good!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: What do you think? You going?
attributes.name: Community Hawker

attributes.content: Don't wanna die, I'll be real. I'm not going. Think of all the pictures still waiting for me to take them.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: (Shrug) I kinda want to see those art investors piss their pants in fear.
attributes.name: Community Hawker

attributes.content: That's tasteless.
attributes.name: Community Artist

attributes.content: Tasteless?
attributes.name: Community Hawker

attributes.content: Pant-pissing's no good show. What I wanna see is the art Reynell bought.
attributes.name: Community Artist

attributes.content: I thought you'd have to cough up for tickets from Reynell to see the goods, but it changes things if we're going in to save them anyway—
attributes.name: Community Artist

attributes.content: I—I—I mean, if you're gonna...
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: What are you pulling out Reynell's pamphlet for?
attributes.name: Community Hawker

attributes.content: ...This.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: Galería Krysztauowa Exhibition Hall 2, Exhibit 14. An anonymous Minoan bard's manuscript from the night before Sargon annexed Minos.
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: How could such a beautiful poem, such a precious manuscript, end up bought by Reynell...
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: I learned Minoan just for this one poem! I'll recite it for you right now—
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: Don't bother. It's all Minoan to me.
attributes.name: Community Artist

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: *sigh* What the heck are you crying for?
attributes.name: Community Artist

attributes.content: When I just think about that bard's bitter fate, and then I think about that manuscript, and then I think about me, I just—I just...
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: I'm going, is what I am! Even if the bombs blow me up when I see it, it'll be worth it! I have to go!!
attributes.name: Community Resident

attributes.content: Considering the number of hostages, we can have the majority of our people evac the ones we rescue. Best leave HVT suppression and explosive disposal work to us.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Catapult, is Tequila on comms right now?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I got him.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Mr. Tequila?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Miss Ela? Don't tell me you're crashing the Galería with Arleta. It's dangerous in here—
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: We're the ones you hire to deal with this sort of thing, sir.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Catapult says you're trapped in a darkroom on the east wing third floor of the gallery, and the room is filled with explosives. Seeing how lively it is downstairs, there should be plenty of people shut in there, correct?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Are the Captain's men in there? Have they noticed the bombs?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: They should be there, but it's too noisy. I can't quite make anything out... hold on—
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Tequila?!
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: (Whisper) Two soldiers passed by the darkroom entrance just now. They were discussing how to load the art onto their trucks.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Good. That's what we'll build our plans around.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: (Whisper) Say, is something this small really gonna blow up whoever's in there?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Whisper) Blowing up the galería's glass walls is one thing, but we're talking about the warehouse that Mateo used as his command node. Who knows if he has patched up the walls here...
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: (Whisper) Of course it will.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: (Whisper) But... okay, you're rappelled outside the second floor, but you're still standing against a wall... Shouldn't you bust a window, and throw these things in?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Did you hear something just now?
attributes.name: Voices from Behind Bunker

attributes.content: It was like... donk, donk, donk?
attributes.name: Voices from Behind Bunker

attributes.content: Well, except it was five donks.
attributes.name: Voices from Behind Bunker

attributes.content: Three.
attributes.name: Voices from Behind Bunker

attributes.content: Who gives a damn if it was three or five? Doesn't matter, we can die of old age holding this bunker if we want. All those idiots in the plaza can do is stand around drooling—
attributes.name: Voices from Behind Bunker

attributes.content: Deployed! Time to pull back!
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: A string of explosions rings out of the building.
Catapult's jaw hangs slack as she stares at Fuze. About to offer a word of admiration, Fuze shakes his head at her.
And then from inside the room, an even more violent explosion. The Cluster Charge has ignited the explosives cache within.
Ela, this is Fuze. We should have hostiles from perimeter defense coming out now. Get ready to engage.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: And Catapult, it's about time we move.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Don't you think... the explosions already woulda knocked them out?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Never assume your enemy's an idiot, even if he really is.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Incoming, incoming!
attributes.name: Distant Soldiers

attributes.content: Are you... some kinda genius?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Not in a million years. What I have is training, intel, synergy with my teammates, and just a little pinch of technology.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: It's that simple.
attributes.name: Fuze
